comments: At 6, the sequence becomes periodic with period 81. [From _T. D. Noe_, Oct 05 2008]
references: J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 15.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
Nick Hobson, Python program for this sequence
mathematica: s=0; Join[{s}, Table[s=FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[2+s]]], {100}]] [From _T. D. Noe_, Oct 05 2008]NestList[FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[#+2]]]&,0,100]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 13 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Jon E. Schoenfield_ and _John W. Layman_, Mar 27 2010
